title: "Pay a tax GRU transaction with sub-account"
description: "Use this endpoint to pay a tax GRU debited from a sub-account. (This feature is used for specific cases and requires pre-configuration in baas)"

<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Pay a tax GRU transaction with sub-account"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"post"}
  path={"/tax/gru/pay/sub-account"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Use this endpoint to pay a tax GRU debited from a sub-account. (This feature is used for specific cases and requires pre-configuration in baas)

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={undefined}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>
